Package ie.gmit.sw.util

Interface Terminal

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectoryPath, ImagePath, OutputPath
public sealed interface Terminal
permits ImagePath, DirectoryPath, OutputPath
This is a sealed interface which has a public method and a default method which takes input from the terminal and check if the file path exist
Since:
2020-01-06

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default java.lang.Boolean checkIfPathExist​(java.lang.String inputImagePath)
    this method checks whether the input image file exist or not and display appropriate message
    java.io.File getInput()
    accepts input from the console/terminal

  • Method Details

    • getInput

      java.io.File getInput()
      accepts input from the console/terminal
      Returns:
      File an object of file

    • checkIfPathExist

      default java.lang.Boolean checkIfPathExist​(java.lang.String inputImagePath)
      this method checks whether the input image file exist or not and display appropriate message
      Parameters:
      inputImagePath - input image path in string form
      Returns:
      Boolean if the file exist return true else return false
